Exactly Why Cloud File Transfer helps Small Businessperson

March 9, 2017james
ShareTweetSign Up

A part of how cloud file transfer helps small businesses is in its scalability.

Johnnie Michaels a freelance designer is constantly sending files to a secretarial service and says, “The scalability of cloud file transfer and storage offers great benefits and significant cost savings to my small shop and many different kinds of small businesses I’m sure can get the same benefit”.

Through modern systems like multi-tenant infrastructure, file transfer providers like Guru Transfer can offer flexibility for services where small businesses can essentially order from a menu of services and discontinue services when they are not needed.

Johnnie added that, “One of the great benefits of cloud file transfer is the ability for small business owners like me, to create fully functional mobile offices.” He added that he is an avid traveler and often lives the laptop lifestyle, so while he’s visiting, say, a mountain ski resort he’s able to get the necessary files to Becky at the secretarial service processing all his graphs and charts.

  • Building on these basic benefits can often help small businesses to innovate or automate parts of specific business processes.

Each small business scenario is different, but the benefits of Guru Transfer are widely applied, as experts predict that this type of model is already causing tremendous shifts in the business world.

Small business owners who want to reduce costs without sacrificing their ability to do business and compete with larger companies are using the Cloud. Guru Transfer is scalable, so it allows small businesses to create a plan for growth that utilizes the benefits of the Cloud without a significant up-front investment.

A previous article shows us how families everywhere are loving file transfer with Guru Transfer...

If you are ready to put the Guru Transfer to work for your business, you can start small so you can see the benefits without making major changes to your operations. Over time, you will discover news ways to use and benefit from the GT app.

  • Many small businesses are using images, audio and video to enhance their marketing activities.

These files often take up a significant part of your hard drive space, which can be costly. The Guru Transfer app allows you to shift the storage of large files off of your local system, saving local storage for the files you need to access every day.

You can start at whatever growth rate is right for you, and gradually increase your usage over time, while only paying incrementally for the services and access you need. Guru Transfer is also self-managed by the apps that provide the services, so you can eliminate or at least reduce the need for an in-house IT staff to manage your technology.

  • As a small business owner importance of backing up files.

You surely don’t want to lose everything in the case of a systems failure or other disaster. There are many ways that cloud file transfer can help small businesses depending on their core operations and IT infrastructure needs.

Whether you have in-house staff or a team spread across a distance, the Guru Transfer app is ideal for sharing and transferring files effortless.

Hop over to LinkedIn where Guru Transfer founder, Rohit Srivastava tells us more about file transfer being as easy as sending a link, eliminating the cumbersome process of emailing large files or saving copies on drives that are then mailed.
